name: clintrials-mcp
description: MCP server for accessing and analyzing clinical trials data from ClinicalTrials.gov
long_description: A comprehensive Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that enables AI assistants to access clinical trials data from ClinicalTrials.gov. Features include searching trials by condition, intervention, sponsor, and NCT IDs, retrieving detailed trial information, analyzing trial phases, and generating field statistics.
